title: Guys Please help!
body:
Hello guys, I just want to tell you, that I can't run LoL...The problem is that i've seen on the internet that my pc can run this game at minimum requirements.I know it's an old pc but that's not a reason....to don't run it. I tried to download it. Then I played 1 or 2 games with no problems (very low 35-50 fps).At the next when i was trying to play a game it was stucking in the loading screen and I was restarting the pc the whole time....Then I delete it because of these problems...Maybe my 256mb graphics card (GeForce 8200) don't helps but on the internet i can see that I can run it.....

HELP ME GUYS!

replies.body: We have[ recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide available to check on your PC and see if anything might need updating.  There isn't a lot I would be able to offer with outdated specs, but you could use the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help.  More specifically, the guide can help make sure that your drivers are up to date and systems are in the best ship it could be.  I hope that helps!
